Exploratory factor analysis based on the psych::fa function

exploratory_fa.Rd

Exploratory factor analysis based on the psych::fa function

exploratory_fa(..., factor_names = NULL, sort = TRUE, cut = 0.2, round = 2)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed to the psych::fa function.
sort

If TRUE, loadings are sorted.
cut

Loadings below cut will be ommited in the resulting data frame.
round

Number of digitis to round loadings (based on the base::round function)

Value

A data.frame

Examples

exploratory_fa(
  select_items(ex_itrf, subscale %in% c('Int', 'Ext')),
  nfactors = 2
)
